fields.name: Sudden Entrance (Passive):
fields.value: If you beat your score last evening by 25% or more, your attack power will double tonight.

fields.name: Shears:
fields.value: Attack someone with your attack power.

fields.name: Demon Child (Locked):
fields.value: Unlock by killing 3 players with shears. You may submit a dummy and use shears exactly once after dying. You can only see the graveyard/spoiler chat after death by opting out of this ability or using it up.

fields.name: Clocktower (Passive):
fields.value: If the unseen faction fails to kill at night, you will die.
